data.title: Eagle Media

data.text:
CREATE

SOMETHING

THAT WILL

SOAR.

WHO IS EAGLE?

Eagle Media is more than just a radio company—we’re a trusted media partner with deep roots in the community. From our beginnings in radio broadcasting, we’ve grown into a multi-platform media organization offering digital marketing, social media management, and more. Our mission is to connect local businesses, voices, and stories with their communities, all while delivering content that matters. We live and work in the communities we serve, and we’re passionate about supporting local initiatives and helping businesses thrive.

BROADCAST

RADIO

We have radio broadcasts in 3 states.

Kansas

Missouri

Nebraska

LIVE

ONLINE

Website Development, Ads, & Streaming

Trusted by businesses large and small, Eagle Online offers a full suite of Digital Advertising products. Brands can take full advantage of our local markets and audiences with local news sites.

COMMUNITY

LOCAL

Eagle is located throughout the midwest.

Great Bend, KS

Hutchinson, KS

Hays, KS

Manhattan & Junction City, KS

Salina, KS

North Platte, NE

Alliance, NE

St Joseph, MO

WHERE ARE WE?

In small towns and bustling cities alike, our stations resonate with the voices and stories of local people. We are located in 3 states and expanding. With a commitment to celebrating local culture, promoting regional events, and amplifying the voices of our listeners, Eagle Media continues to thrive on the belief that strong communities are built through shared experiences and a genuine connection to each other.

Let Our Work

Speak for Itself

Since the 1950s, Eagle has proudly partnered with hundreds of local clients. We specialize in digital advertising, audio streaming services like Spotify and Pandora, and a variety of other platforms to help our clients amplify their voices and reach their target audience.

JOIN THE FAMILY

Join us as we embark on an exciting journey of growth and expansion! We’re looking for passionate individuals who share our commitment to serving local communities across the Midwest. Together, let’s amplify the voices of our region and continue to foster meaningful connections through the power of radio. Explore opportunities with us today and be a part of shaping the future of Eagle!
